title: Save up to $700 on LG TVs during BestBuy’s ongoing Super Bowl sale
content:
Thinking of getting a new TV to catch Super Bowl LVI? You’re in luck. BestBuy is currently offering some great deals on LG TVs right now and you can save up to $700 on a brand new OLED TV. LG makes some of the best TVs on the market today and we can assure you that

The post Save up to $700 on LG TVs during BestBuy’s ongoing Super Bowl sale appeared first on xda-developers.
description: BestBuy is currently offering up to $700 off on LG TVs as part of its Super Bowl LVI sale. Grab one before the deals expire.
